page.title: 13 Northam Area
page.content: The residents of Northam are very friendly and there is a nice atmosphere. The residents feel that it is not a very good place for the elderly and young children to live. The river is polluted by the factories and the roads are busy and dangerous to old folk and children. There are too many flats and not enough houses and even though there are three small parks they feel there is not enough space for children to play. Northam has its own precinct and people feel that they have good access to the town centre where they can do their shopping.
